author: vmassol
msg: WARNING: Full plugin rewrite! Version 3.0 of the Cactus plugin now relies on the newest Cactus/Ant integration which has completely changed since version 2.0 (and 2.1-SNAPSHOT, which by the way has never been released, and never will). Thanks to the new Cactus/Ant, some features have also been added. The plugin now uses the new <cactifywar> and <cactus> Ant tasks (see http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/integration/ant/index.html for more details).

author: plynch
msg: o adding context.getVariable qualifications and adding support to copy the conf files with webserver plugin properties.

author: plynch
msg: o sometimes properties fetched using the ${some.property} notation don't always come through. in particular when I added a maven.webserver.port.http calue to my project.properties and ran the plugin, the plugin failed on the check for maven.webserver.test.socket because the ${maven.webserver.test.socket} notation was used. when I switched to context.getVariable('maven.webserver.test.socket') it found my project.properties specified value no problem. Amazing....
o added maven.appserver properties to the filterset so that the two plugins can integrate better.
